attributes.review: I hate this app it’s the absolute WORST. I don’t think we let sexual predator run our country. He ra_ist. You can fill in the blank with either a p or c. Both are correct. I wish nothing but the absolute worst horrible messed up things to happen to trump. Oh and we need to save the First Lady and her son Barron.
attributes.title: I HATE THIS HOT CHEETO

attributes.review: I went to eat with my family, then after I saw trump. I wanted a picture with him then he smacked me and told me to get down on my knees. I did then he told me to slap his Pepe I told him no then. He got his steak and smacked me with it. Then sucked my toes I had to go to therapy after all that happened.
attributes.title: The orange smacked me

attributes.review: This app was the absolute biggest inconvenience of my life. I thought the president would at least make a workable app for his peers but all it does is take up space and slow my phone down, not to mention the constant glitches.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: hey... so I was really hoping I’d find some information about trump addressing his controversial character, but unfortunately it was to no avail. I downloaded to find more reason to like him but I couldn’t find any info to help... please fix this mr president, rooting for you!
attributes.title: wouldn’t recommend

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and as soon as I did a big orange pedif- I mean president, Donald J Trump knocks on my door and kicked me in my shin. Luckily my pet fridge saw and sat on him. That’s when I made the courageous decision to reserve 8 tickets for the rally, but I couldn’t make it because I had to walk my pet fridge. What a sad tale😢.
attributes.title: I won’t be attending the rally🤭

attributes.review: I was on the app see all the boomers who like this orange And its flashed Bright lights and made me go blind now and i walked into a pole broken all my teeth, bent my arm into a whole other dimension, and lost my hearing So i advise you not to download this app or you will end up like me or others
attributes.title: Made me go to the hospital

attributes.review: i am so scared right now. after i downloaded this app paranormal things started happening. my window was closed but my pictures on the walls were moving. i deleted this app quickly and all of a sudden i heard a loud noise everything was ok. DONT GET THIS APP !!! stay safe.
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP !!

attributes.review: I was soooo excited to make a difference in the Trump 2020 campaign and get back at my snowflake liberal “friends”, but the app is so glitchy I couldn’t even navigate it! Truly upsetting. Thoughts and prayers to the dev team, hopefully they can fix this to make this app as great as Trump’s America! 🇺🇸
attributes.title: Big disappointment

attributes.review: so i thought it was a game cus it started showing me weird scary creatures. it also started slowing down my phone. and it gave me a virus😡. not only that it lies about everything. and i let it use my location and some wierd old guy showed up at my house. dont ever get this app please.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
